name: binaryDecode
description:
Converts a string to a binary object. Used to convert
 binary data that has been encoded into string format
 back into binary data.

params.name: string
params.description: A string containing encoded binary data.

params.name: encoding
params.description:
A string specifying the algorithm used to encode the original
 binary data into a string; must be one of the following:
 - hex: characters 0-9 and A-F represent the hexadecimal value
 of each byte; for example, 3A.
 - UU: data is encoded using the UNIX UUencode algorithm.
 - base64: data is encoded using the Base64 algorithm.

examples.title: Decode a string using hex back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: use binaryDecode to decode with hex

examples.title: Decode a string using UNIX UUencode (UU) back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: use binaryDecode to decode with UNIX UUencode (UU)

examples.title: Decode a string using base64 back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: use binaryDecode to decode with base64

examples.title: Create a byte array with 16 bytes
examples.description: Each byte in the array is set to 0
